mapper.select: select p.post_id from sys_post p left join sys_user_post up on up.post_id = p.post_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = up.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
select p.post_id, p.post_name, p.post_code from sys_post p left join sys_user_post up on up.post_id = p.post_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = up.user_id where u.user_name = #{userName}
mapper.sql: select sp.post_id, sp.post_code, sp.post_name, sp.post_sort, sp.`status`, sp.create_by, sp.create_time, sp.update_by, sp.update_time, sp.remark from sys_post sp
mapper.select:
and sp.post_code like concat('%', #{postCode}, '%') and sp.post_name like concat('%', #{postName}, '%') and sp.`status` = #{status}
order by create_time desc
